name: prompt-dj-minimal-render
description: Minimal PromptDJ application for Render deployment

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp index.css dist/index.css && esbuild index.tsx midi-controller.ts utils.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --splitting --format=esm --define:process.env.API_KEY='"'$API_KEY'"' --loader:.ts=tsx --platform=browser --external:lit --external:lit/* --external:@google/genai
